title: How to add notes on my TI 84 - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s super simple to add notes to your TI 84. Source: How to Save Notes on Your Graphing Calculator TI-84 Plus CE Here’s a step by step guide: Hit the prgm button on your graphing calculator.Slide over to NEW and hit enterNow we want to give our notes a title and then press enterUsing this space, we can write as many notes as we want. Check out InfinityCalcs Where To Find section to locate any command.Once you have written your notes, press 2nd Quit to exit the notes. Try to avoid pressing del or clear. This might erase the content you have entered.When you want to get back to your saved notes, press prgm then slide over to edit and select the program where you have written your notes.

I’m not aware of a note-taking app for the TI-84, but the article at this link should tell you how to go about putting notes in your calculator in the form of a program, which can be accessed using the “PRGM” button. How to Put Text Files On Your TI Calculator
